General_Description: '''Tastes like Chicken''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''[[Chicken]] craving? I hear they keep a hidden coop at the [[Temple of Zeus, Messenia|temple]] north of [[Messene]], overlooking the mine. You will find me there in a bag of feed.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
